EmailTemplate.name: Email from Steve.Email from Steve final
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I wanted to personally thank you for being a loyal Turbonomic customer, and for the time your team has put into making this partnership a success. They have gone above and beyond, and are dedicated to making digital transformation a reality at your company.
With the latest release of Turbonomic, you and 20% of the Fortune 500 are able to map the application down to all individual components of your data center, making your infrastructure completely application-aware. There’s still so much we can accomplish together, and I’d like to schedule some time with you over the coming weeks to discuss your goals for the coming year and how Turbonomic can assist you with exceeding those goals!
Please respond directly to this email with a few times you are available and I’ll send a calendar hold.
Thank you again for our partnership, we are committed to your success. Looking forward to speaking with you in the next few weeks!
Sincerely,
Steve
General Manager and Vice President Commercial Sales, Americas Email: steve@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:steve@turbonomic.com]]> <[[mailto:steve@turbonomic.com]]>Cell: 774-273-0056 Office: 781-418-5232 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087 contact us <[[http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker]]> | website <[[http://www.turbonomic.com?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker]]> | privacy policy <[[http://www.turbonomic.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker]]>
